description: Try our easy to follow Italian-Style Bean & Kale Stew With Pangrattato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Italian-Style Bean & Kale Stew With Pangrattato Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch kale, stalks discarded, leaves torn

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs oil in a large, wide saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, celery, 4 crushed garlic cloves and chopped rosemary and cook, stirring often, for 7 minutes. Add beans, tomatoes, quinoa and stock, stirring to combine. Bring to the boil, season and reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes. Increase heat to medium. Stir in kale, in batches, and cook for 5 minutes, stirring regularly, or until wilted.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a large frying pan. Add 2 bruised garlic cloves, rosemary sprigs and parsley and cook for 1 minute. Add bread and cook for 5 minutes, tossing regularly, or until golden and crisp. Scatter pangrattato and pecorino over stew to serve.
